pages.text: $(li)The Frostmancer is a powerful mage who has specialized in the ice element.$(br)$(li)It is able to pull in their enemies, slow their movement speed and even summon ice blocks on top of them that once they fall they deal a lot of damage.$(br)$(li)The Fromancer can be found in the Ice Castle.
On death they may drop Snow Blocks, Ice, Blue Ice, Snowballs, Diamonds, and even Totems of Undying.
